From: 
Sent: Thursday, July 23, 2020 5:12 PM 
To: (USANYS) •:>; 
(USANYS) •cl> (USANYS); 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: letter to Epstein estate trustees' counsel 
(USANYS) 
Team, we understand you've asked us to draft a letter to the executors of Epstein's estate (who are also the co-trustees of 
the 1953 Trust Agreement) on a couple issues — a draft is attached for your review. We've also included a question about 
any waiver of attorney-client privilege, which will be helpful to have their position on in connection with our discovery 
review and production process. 
thanks, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00015848
